monsters.name: werebeaver
monsters.description: Some poor humanoid has become infected with werebeaveritis. They have turned into a rabid beaver. It thinks you kicked its dam and it's not happy about it.
monsters.fightDamage: The werebeaver skillfully dodges your attack, using its tail as a springboard to get close enough to sink its vile teeth into your leg. You lose one point of health.
monsters.fightDie: The werebeaver goes limp and falls to the ground.

monsters.name: monstrousKoiFish
monsters.description: An evil mage has gigantified a once-pretty-looking koi fish and granted it the ability to breathe air. It now sports fangs and a denim jacket with the sleeves ripped off. It has sick tribal tats around its fins.
monsters.fightDamage: The monstrous koi fish wobbles around your attack. It then slides toward you, sinking its fang into you. You lose one point of health.
monsters.fightDie: The koi fish suddenly stiffens its muscles. It begins to shrink, slowly at first, then rapidly. It is now the size of a typical koi, flopping around inside the denim jacket it once wore.

monsters.name: pheonixBear
monsters.description: It appears to be part bear, part phoenix with a large blue mane and azure fur.
monsters.fightDamage: The Pheonix Bear RAGES, dropping its head and charging at you with it's fearsome claws. You lose one point of health.
monsters.fightDie: The Phoenix Bear gives a whimpering cry, self-engulfing into a pile of ash... better get out of here fast.

monsters.name: mummy
monsters.description: Wrapped in ancient cloths, this creature moans in a low rummbling tone
monsters.fightDamage: The mummy is faster than it looks, and before you know it, the creature has grabbed you. You feel lifeforce drain out of your body. You lose one point of health.
monsters.fightDie: The mummy, in one final gasp, dissolves into a pile of cloth
